episode_event_ch0136_00_platane/6901_110:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] searched all over
Pasio with Professor Sycamore.
Together, they found a strange specimen!
episode_event_ch0136_00_platane/6901_100: It seems to be alive... But what is it?

Based on its cell-like appearance, it could be part
of a larger Pokémon.

OK. I’d like to take this sample and examine it
even more...

How about I call you if I figure something out?
Then we can—
That’s odd... Are you concerned about something?
